text: when it comes to protecting the lives of
every American access to real-time data
can be the difference between mission
accomplished and mission failure imagine
information delivered from air support
that is immediate and actionable if
instant real-time threat information
sharing with our allies was achievable
imagine troops with real-time
intelligence to make the best decisions
to save lives this world is possible
with cloud computing our warfighters
on land in air at sea or at the tactical
edge can have access to the most
innovative and secure solutions with
cloud the Pentagon can analyze vast
quantities of data in real-time while
keeping data and highly classified
information secure with cloud war

needed to dominate the modern
battlefield with cloud the Pentagon can

expedite communications but most

and war fighters protected the Defense
